name: AWS Access Key
description: AWS access key detected. Never commit AWS credentials.

name: Google API Key
description: Google API key detected. These can be used to access Google Cloud services.

name: GitHub Token
description: GitHub Personal Access Token detected. These provide full API access.

name: Slack Token
description: Slack bot or webhook token found. May allow message sending or reading.

name: Discord Bot Token
description: Discord bot token format detected. Can be used to control a bot.

name: JWT Token
description: Possible JWT token found. Verify it isn’t leaking sensitive claims.

name: Base64 Encoded Secret
description: Potential base64 encoded data found. Verify it’s not a secret.

name: Hardcoded Password
description: Hardcoded password-like value found. Consider using env vars instead.

name: RSA/PEM Private Key
description: A private key was detected. Never expose these in source code.

name: .env Dump or Sensitive Env Vars
description: .env-style secret variable detected. Use environment-level secrets instead.

name: Credentials in URL
description: Credential info found in URL. Avoid putting secrets in URLs.
